      • index

        public static void index()

      • createArticle

        public static void createArticle(java.lang.String author,
                 java.lang.String authorTwitterHandle,
                 java.lang.String title,
                 java.lang.String summary,
                 java.lang.String entry,
                 java.lang.String headerPicUrl,
                 java.lang.String category,
                 java.lang.String rawTags)
        Parameters:
        author - - author's name
        title - - title of the article
        summary - - short summary of the article
        entry - - actual content of the article, html formatted
        headerPicUrl - - link to header img provided by filepicker
        category - - article category, @See Categories.java

      • rateArticle

        public static void rateArticle(long articleId,
               int score,
               java.lang.String category)
        Rate one aspect of an article and update article avg rating and rank
        Parameters:
        articleId - db id of the article to be rated
        score - score of the article in a category. Values from 1-5 are accepted
        category - specifies which category (i.e. aspect) of the article is rated. Accepted values are: writingStyle, nonAlignment, overall

        public static void getArticle(long id)
